Module com.fy916.bubblebobble
Package com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.elements.mapelements

Class MapObject

java.lang.Object
com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.elements.ObjectFeature
com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.elements.GameObject
com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.elements.mapelements.MapObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
CeilingUnit, FloorUnit, WallUnit
public abstract class MapObject extends GameObject
An abstract class which is extended from the GameObject, this is intended for the objects that will not moving around within the game world (unlinke MovingObject). This class contains some ability that the MapObject will have when colliding that to move the collided object to its side to avoid intersections.
Author:
fy916

  • Constructor Details

    • MapObject

      public MapObject​(InteractableWorld world, int colNum, int rowNum, int objectwidth, int objectheight)
      Constructor that takes unit column and rows to initialize the object
      Parameters:
      world - current game world
      colNum - the column of location the unit in the game world, note this is not the exact coordinate but the relevant location of the objects without multiplying the unit size
      rowNum - the row of location the unit in the game world, note this is not the exact coordinate but the relevant location of the objects without multiplying the unit size
      objectheight - the height of the object
      objectwidth - the width of the object

    • MapObject

      public MapObject​(int x, int y, int objectwidth, int objectheight, InteractableWorld world)
      Constructor that takes the coordinates of x and y of the object to initialize it
      Parameters:
      world - current game world
      x - the x coordinate of the object to be initialized
      y - the y coordinate of the object to be initialized
      objectheight - the height of the object
      objectwidth - the width of the object
